contest-event.event-date:
July 9, 1938 D Cramlington Contest
Cramlington Contest 0 Other
cramlington-contest
None
Recollections of Balfe
Cramlington Park, Northumberland Prizes - 1st £8 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £2, 4th £1. March contest - 1st(£1) Coxlodge, 2nd (10s) Hartley Main, 3rd Ravensworth. Hymn tune contest - 1st(10s. and cup) Hartley Main, 2nd (5s.)Boldon, 3rd Coxlodge, 4th Ravensworth. Promoted in connection with Cramlington Childrens Gala. 4 bands competed.
Jan. 22, 2014, 2:46 p.m. Jan. 22, 2019, 12:11 p.m.
1 Ravensworth Collieries J. W. Taylor
2 Coxlodge Institute Band George Snowdon
3 Dudley Workmens [Northumberland] J. B. Bootland
4 Boldon Colliery Band J. Ford
